titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4656) to authorize the Forest Service to convey certain lands in the Lake Tahoe Basin to the Washoe County School District for use as an elementary school site.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-985, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4656 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 312.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 634.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 196 - 181 (Roll no. 541).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/17/2000--Introduced. Provides for consideration of H.R.4656 (land transfer in the Lake Tahoe Basin to the Washoe County School District).
